sentences.en: Above the bush the trees stood in serried ranks.
sentences.cn: 荆棘之上耸立着密密麻麻的大树.

sentences.en: As the closely serried leaves bent , a tide of opaque emerald could be glimpsed.
sentences.cn: 这时候叶子与花也有一丝的颤动,像闪电般,霎时传过荷塘的那边去了.

sentences.en: He could not as yet with the magnates the East the serried Sequoias of Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 他还不能够同东部大王们——华尔街林立的参天红杉——并列.

sentences.en: The fields were mostly patches laid on the serried landscape, between crevices and small streams.
sentences.cn: 农田大部分是地缝和小溪之间的条状小块.

sentences.en: the serried ranks of reporters waiting outside
sentences.cn: 密密麻麻地排在外面等待的记者

words.tran_cn: 密集的；林立的；重叠罗列的
拥挤，密集（serry的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: （指士兵的行列等）密集的，靠紧的
trans.tran_en: standing or arranged closely together in rows
